name: Fur Affinity - Optimized and Red
description:
For getting rid of the footer, sidebar, ads, and other annoying things no one wants to see. :P And now, changes the layout color!

NOTE: TO REMOVE ADS, you need Adblock! I recommend Ad Block Plus. :)
additional_info:
For anyone who's not so good with CSS/Stylish and wants to change the colors:
#100 - "Black-red" (Text for form stuff)
#500 - Red (Main background)
#900 - Light Red (Background for headers)
#B00 - Red (Background for form stuff)
#FFF - White (Text)

If you don't get it, just play around with the colors, you'll get it eventually. :) For color codes, you can go here http://html-color-codes.com , and if you wanna make it shorter, you can only do it if it's something like #AABBCC, and then you can shorten it to #ABC. If it's something like #ABCDDD, you can't shorten it, and you'll just have to leave it like that.
